::KitKat::

She couldn't hear his words,  she only heard the ringing.  She felt 
numb and felt her eyes closing.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Testifier pressed his rifle to KitKat's head.
> 
> "No. You killed someone important to me, you shall repay me for it.
> Technosis was crushed that you killed her, I know it, she told me 
that if
> she would rather go through any kind of torture than have her 
friends kill
> her, and you did just that. You are scum." Testifier said...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Sunday, September 03, 2000 10:15 AM
> Subject: Re: A final word
> 
> 
> >
> > ::KitKat::
> >
> > She looked up at  Testifier.  She drew her rifle and pointed it at
> > him.  "Now, get out of my way.  Go inside the base and we will
> > discuss this later.  If you kill me, you are no better than those
> > maximals who had killed Time Bomb for the sport and were goint to 
put
> > Land Mine through the most unspeakable tortures a bot could go
> > through.  Now GO! NOW!"
> >
> > She got to her feet and walked towards the maximals.  They were 
more
> > of them now than there were at the start of the fight.  She 
knealed
> > down to say a prayer to the Matrix.  She opened her 
link. "Drillbit.
> > Just incase stiff happenes, I love you. And Drillbit's in charge,
> > just in case."  She closed her link and prayed again.  She got up 
and
> > aimed her rifle at the Chosen ones and the new comers.  She opened
> > fire with everything she had.
> >
> >
> >
> >
